titleStmt.title: An Apostrophe from the loyal party to the Kings Most Sacred Majesty; humbly shewing how the next House of Commons by law may be purged of it's dis.affected members.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings Most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Error in paging: p. 4 misnumbered as "2."
Reproduction of original in the California State Library, Sutro Branch.
